questions.question: Each 1-mm square in an ECG represents in time:
Each 1-mm square in an ECG is in voltage:

answers.a: Start of P to end of R wave
answers.b: End of P to start of R wave
answers.c: End of P to start of QRS wave
answers.d: start of P to start of R wave

The PP Interval is an indicator of:
